name: S&L Services
overview:
S&L SERVICES INC

Provides GPS Fleet Management Services World Wide That Reduces Fleet Costs And Raises Fleet Efficiency and Security Products in indiana and Michigan

Superior Lasting Services, Incorporated (S&L) is a Indiana-based GPS Tracking and Security Company. As an industry leader GPS based Fleet management S&L is committed to assisting companies reduce operating costs and manage there assets more efficiently saving you money.

Live Fleet Tracking System Whether in government or the public sector, the bottom line for fleet management is performance and cost; achieving maximum results in seconds. Utilizing satellite technology developed by the Department of Defense, S&L Services, Inc. has done just that for private businesses and government agencies alike, maximizing fleet performance and efficiency while minimizing costs. S&L offers GPS devices that track in 1,5, and 10 Second Updates that use a Web Based software for fleet monitoring 24/7 by the customer. S&L Services, Inc. has no contracts for is services is based on a month to month program.

Our GPS Tracking products help companies with fleets reduce operating costs and manage there assets more efficiently.

Reduce rising fleet expenses Improve vehicle utilization Reduce vehicle operating costs Eliminate or reduce overtime Manage your field personnel actively Replace paper time sheets in the field with electronic timekeeping Reduce downtime of field employees Reduce time spent at unauthorized locations Document actual routes driven and stops made Show you how simple saving money can be Eliminate employee Timesheet fraud

S&L Services “Securing Your Future”
